connector
Class Java_Connector

java.lang.Object
  connector.Java_Connector

public class Java_Connector
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to connect to a database All of the information required to access the database is located in this file Any query to the database needs to use an object from this class Only java functions are used but still requires the mysql-connector to connect to the database

Version:
2.0
Author:
Anthony Scata
